title: MD
biography: Land of Hope is a 2018 Finnish romantic drama film directed by Markku Pölönen. It was written by Pölönen and Antti Heikkinen. Set between 1945 and 1952, the film centres on Anni Malmberg, a wealthy woman who falls for Veikko Naskali, a wounded veteran of the Continuation War. Anni's parents disapprove of the match, so the couple establish their own life in North Karelia. The film was nominated for two Jussi Awards and won both: Oona Airola won Best Actress and Antti Nikkinen won Best Set Design.
aiSummary: Veikko Salomaa is a population health specialist with an H-index of 204 at THL Finland (Faculty). Has been published in Nature, Nature Genetics, The Lancet. Based in Finland.
